tool.name: MethylIT: pool from GRanges list
tool.command: #import re #set input_data_dir='input_data_dir' mkdir input_data_dir && #for $i in $lr: #set file_name = $i.file_name #set identifier = re.sub('[^\s\w\-\\.]', '_', str($i.element_identifier)) ln -s '$file_name' '$input_data_dir/$identifier' && #end for Rscript '$__tool_directory__/methylit_pool_from_granges_list.R' --input_data_dir '$input_data_dir' --stat '$stat_cond.stat' #if str($stat_cond.stat) == "jackmean": --jstat '$stat_cond.jstat' #end if --num_cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} --prob '$prob_cond.prob' #if str($prob_cond.prob) == 'yes': --column_number $column_number #else: --column_number 1 #end if --output '$output' #if str($output_log_cond.output_log) == 'yes': &>'$output_log'; #else: &>output_log.txt; if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then cp output_log.txt '$output'; fi #end if

param.name: stat
param.label: Select statistic used to estimate the methylation pool

param.name: jstat
param.label: Select the option to compute the jacknife vector and corresponding mean of the selected statistics

param.name: prob
param.label: Is the variable for pooling between 0 and 1?

param.name: column_number
param.label: Column number of the probability values in the GRanges files
